title: A CSO's 9/11 Story: CSO Perspectives Bonus.
description: For the 20th anniversary of 9/11, Rick Howard, the Cyberwire’s CSO, Chief Analyst, and Senior Fellow, recounts his experience from inside the Pentagon running the communications systems for the Army Operations Center.
itunes:title: A CSO's 9/11 Story: CSO Perspectives Bonus.
itunes:author: CyberWire, Inc.
itunes:summary: For the 20th anniversary of 9/11, Rick Howard, the Cyberwire’s CSO, Chief Analyst, and Senior Fellow, recounts his experience from inside the Pentagon running the communications systems for the Army Operations Center.
